meanings: (어떤 장소로) come, (나타나다) turn up, show up, (방문하다) visit
실용회화-흐린날씨 I wish it would rain.
Something that is supposed to come has come

meanings.meaning: turn up like a bad penny

vlive.korean: [사전 인터뷰 당시] 그러면 너는 누가 코디로 왔으면 좋겠어? [During the pre-interview] Who do you want as our coordinator? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?
vlive.english: [During the pre-interview] Who do you want as our coordinator?

vlive.korean: 왔으면 좋겠는데 올까요 과연? I hope he will be back. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나를 좋아해주는 사람에게 마음이 움직일까? #고백하기_좋은_순간ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP11
vlive.english: I hope he will be back.

vlive.korean: 빨리 크리스마스 왔으면 좋겠다! I hope it's Christmas soon! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 굿모닝 스테이🖤
루이 빨리 왔으면 좋겠다 - 왜? I hope Louis comes soon. - Why? 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 불금이다🔥
vlive.english: I hope Louis comes soon. - Why?

vlive.korean: 약간 팬분들 많이 왔으면 좋겠다! 그렇지? I hope to see a lot of fans, right? 듣기 View video TWICE : [AutoCut_MINA] TWICE First Half Highlight
vlive.english: I hope to see a lot of fans, right?

examples.korean: I hope it stays dry for our picnic. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 소풍을 하는 동안에는 비가 안 왔으면 좋겠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I hope it stays dry for our picnic. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Will it rain more?I hope not. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 비가 더 올까요?안 왔으면 좋겠어요. Neungyule
examples.english: Will it rain more?I hope not. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I hope he arrives soon. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 빨리 왔으면 좋겠네요. Neungyule
examples.english: I hope he arrives soon. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was hoping you'd be able to come. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 네가 왔으면 한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was hoping you'd be able to come. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I can't wait for spring to come. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 빨리 봄이 왔으면 좋겠어. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can't wait for spring to come. Add to Wordbook
